iti33:4.1: “Dvīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato puggalo yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge.
iti33:4.3: Bhaddakena ca sīlena, bhaddikāya ca diṭṭhiyā.
iti33:4.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato puggalo yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge”ti.
iti33:6.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
